document.full_text: the sledgehammer groundstrokes of juan martin del potro will provide the ultimate test of novak djokovic's armor-plated confidence in the most eagerly anticipated match of the french open so far later friday.
document.title: djokovic facing first serious test against del potro
lines_and_colors: the sledgehammer groundstrokes of juan martin del potro will provide the ultimate test of novak djokovic's armor-plated confidence in the most eagerly anticipated match of the french open so far later friday.
